title: pvp.net patcher kernal has stoped working
body: hi there srsly cant the programers of the game solve this problem like come on am prety sure that this problem can be solved by optimising some of the luncher stuff i recently tryed every singel option on compatibilty and non worked for me like srsly !!!!

replies.body: This error is super common with overzealous security settings preventing the patcher from launching.  You'll want to run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.
